SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Circle
Class Circle implements the Element interface and represents circle in a graphics editor.
ConcreteDecoratorBorder
Class ConcreteDecoratorBorder extends Decorator and adds a border to a graphic element and adds that information to the description.
ConcreteDecoratorColor
Class ConcreteDecoratorColor extends Decorator and adds color to a graphic element and adds that information to the description.
ConcreteDecoratorShadow
Class ConcreteDecoratorShadow extends Decorator and adds shadow to a graphic element and adds that information to the description.
Decorator
Abstract class Decorator implements the Element interface and serves as a base class for all decorators
Element
Interface Element specifies the methods that must be implemented
Main
Class Main which consists of method main(String[]) It creates an instance of a Circle and applies multiple decorators
